title: How to Make Srikaya

steps.headline: Put the 25 of eggs into the mixing basin.
Add the sugar to the basin of eggs.
Stir the mixture of eggs and sugar with the whisk.
Pour the coconut milk into the basin.
Add the pandan extract.
steps.description: Stir it again slowly until the ingredients are mixed.

steps.headline: Transfer the mixture to the small molds.
steps.description: Add mixture to each mold, one by one.

steps.headline: Place the small molds into the steamer.
After 10 minutes of steaming, the srikaya is ready.
steps.description: Take out the molds, unmold the cakes and serve on either one large serving platter or on individual plates.

text: Put the 25 of eggs into the mixing basin.  Add the sugar to the basin of eggs.  Stir the mixture of eggs and sugar with the whisk.  Pour the coconut milk into the basin. Stir it well. Add the pandan extract. Stir it again slowly until the ingredients are mixed. Transfer the mixture to the small molds. Add mixture to each mold, one by one. Place the small molds into the steamer.  After 10 minutes of steaming, the srikaya is ready. Take out the molds, unmold the cakes and serve on either one large serving platter or on individual plates. Finished.
